name: Project Candy
description:
What is this game?

Project Candy is a first-person shooter game where everything is candy. Players will be tasked with a simple objective, survive. Be ready to take out an onslaught of different types of enemies. Use different weapons such as the shotgum, Yolo, and more. Take advantage of the weaponry and different skills such as slowing time down. It might sound easy to survive, but you must constantly eat your enemies to keep the timer going. Good luck. 

How to play

The game is very simple, survive for as long as you can. Use your weapons and skills wisely to last as long as possible. There are some other different aspects like jumping pads to move around the map quicker. 

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse click - Shoot

Left-shift key - Dash

Esc/p - pause game

Credits
